text: Khoob jaan lo ke yeh duniya ki zindagi iske siwa kuch nahin ke ek khel aur dil-lagi aur zaahiri tip top aur tumhara aapas mein ek dusre par fakr jatana aur maal-o-aulad mein ek dusre se badh janey ki koshish karna hai.Iski misal aisi hai jaise ek baarish ho gayi to usse paida honay wali nabataat(vegetation) ko dekh kar kaasht-kaar (kisan) khush ho gaye. Phir wahi kheti pak jati hai aur tum dekhte ho ke woh zard (yellow) ho gayi phir woh bhus (chura chura /crumble) bankar reh jati hai. Iske baraks aakhirat woh jagah hai jahan sakht azaab hai aur Allah ki magfirat aur uski khushnudi hai. Dunkya ki zindagi ek dhoke ke tatti (means of deception) ke siwa kuch nahin
